ItemTooltips.blink: Get this if you are one of the only initiators, it provides you the ability to blink in and stun multiple enemies and allow your team to follow up.
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: BUY IN SIDESHOP - I Choose this over Power Treads
ItemTooltips.vladmir: If you are multiple melees without an Lifesteal, provide this item for your team.
ItemTooltips.armlet: I am well aware that the suggested item is Vanguard, however you should focus on getting Armlet as it provides in-combat Health, Damage & Attack Speed which Vanguard doesn't. It is merely a survivability item which Armlet can also be used as.
ItemTooltips.heavens_halberd: Lesser Main is NOT an Orb Effect. It stacks with Desolator!

AbilityTooltips.slardar_sprint: Since v6.78 - Sprint cooldown is reduced to 28 seconds. Great buff!
AbilityTooltips.slardar_bash: In v6.78 - Bash is no longer Magic Damage, but Physical Damage, which means both the Stun + Damage goes through Black King Bar!
